Class DisplayChangeListener

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.map.event.DisplayChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class DisplayChangeListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject

Listens/handles any events which signal a change in the display.

Author:
Aaron Petkau

Constructor Summary

          Pass the camera so we can obtain the view bounds on any change.
